scenario.description: You find yourself in a bizarre small village. A merchant's cart has been overturned, spilling valuable goods.

choices.text: Help the metaphysical merchant gather their goods
choices.result: The merchant thanks you profusely and offers a metaphysical small reward.

choices.text: Pretend not to notice and walk away
choices.result: You avoid the metaphysical situation entirely.

choices.text: Steal some valuable items while helping
choices.result: You manage to pocket some items without being noticed.

result: You manage to pocket some items without being noticed.

scenario.description: In the bizarre village square, you witness a paradoxical heated argument between two merchants over a bizarre rare artifact.

choices.result: Both merchants appreciate your fair judgment.

choices.text: Side with the peculiar merchant offering you a bizarre bribe
choices.result: You receive a peculiar generous reward but feel guilty.

choices.text: Steal the anomalous artifact during the metaphysical confusion
choices.result: You successfully steal the paradoxical valuable artifact.

result: You successfully steal the surreal valuable artifact.
